          <title>
            <string language="en">Gravity holds artificial satellites in orbit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft hält künstliche Satelliten in der 
Bahn an</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La pesanteur tient les satellites artificiels en 
orbite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A gravidade prende satélites artificiais na 
órbita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La gravità tiene i satelliti artificiali in 
orbita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βαρύτητα κρατά τους τεχνητούς δορυφόρους στην 
τροχιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La gravedad sostiene los satélites artificiales 
en órbita</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how is it possible for an artificial satellite to orbit the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">satellite</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie sie möglich ist, damit
ein künstlicher Satellit die Masse in Umlauf bringt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment est elle 
possible pour qu'un satellite artificiel satellise la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como é possível para 
que um satélite artificial orbite a terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come è possibile 
affinchè un satellite artificiale orbiti intorno alla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς είναι πιθανό για 
έναν τεχνητό δορυφόρο να μπεί η γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo es posible para 
que un satélite artificial mueva en órbita alrededor de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
